name: enumerable
content:

Add to word list
able to be counted or named, one by one: The system provides a user-friendly approach to querying and working with enumerable collections of data.enumerable set The data analyst needs a finitely enumerable set of elements with which to work. Related words

enumerationCompare
innumerable
More examplesFewer examplesThis data comprises an enumerable collection of records.The design can be specified completely using a finite list of symbols; the set of all possible designs is therefore enumerable. I really don't mind what format the list is in, as long as it's enumerable.There is only ever an enumerable number of possibilities to work with.
